name: nocopyrightsounds-api
description: A webscraper for the NoCopyrightSounds website to provide an API

scripts.build: tsc --module CommonJS --outDir dist/cjs && tsc --module ES2020 --outDir dist/esm
scripts.buildWatch: tsc --watch --module CommonJS --outDir dist/cjs && tsc --watch --module ES2020 --outDir dist/esm
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run prettier

author: KaninchenSpeed
